articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: PM Modi to attend BRICS Summit in Johannesburg | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Indian PM Modi will attend the BRICS Summit in Johannesburg, South Africa, after being invited by President Ramaphosa.
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi had a telephonic conversation with South African President Cyril Ramaphosa to convey that he will be visiting Johannesburg to attend the BRICS Summit, the Ministry of Ext… [+2283 chars]
